JobFullDesc: Are you passionate about planet scale cloud services, and want to build the next generation platform and products for M365 business? If so, we are looking for multiple product leaders who are obsessed with driving engineering excellence to architect and deliver intelligence experiences and security/ compliance solutions to our customers. Microsoft 365 (M365) is Microsoft's flagship productivity offering with millions of users used by the largest organizations in the world (Fortune 500) as well as public sector. We provide a distributed, scalable, highly reliable, compliant and secure service for millions of people. Usage and users for Microsoft 365 (M365) is rapidly growing and we are looking for leaders to create center of excellences in various product areas and to build world class teams in India.ResponsibilitiesWe are looking for strong product leaders to help define a vision and roadmap for the product areas and drive the execution with collaboration with other teams distributed globally.
